original_title: New Chairman for Sri Lanka Telecom
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Reyaz Mihular, an independent non-executive director of Sri Lanka Telecom has been appointed its chairman from July 20, replacing Rohan Fernando, the company said in a stock exchange filing.
Fernando will continue to be an independent non-executive director of the board, the statement said.
“They have appointed a chairman, my position has become untenable,” Fernando told EconomyNext.
“I am still in the board, but I will have to decide whether to stay or not.”
